revised_title: Extension of Equations for Planetary Inequalities in Physical Astronomy
tldr: The author extends the equations for determining planetary inequalities, including terms depending on the squares and products of eccentricities, and introduces a new system of indices for arguments of planetary disturbances. He also provides analytical expressions for the development of R to terms multiplied by the squares and products of eccentricities, as well as terms in r(d) multiplied by the first power of the eccentricities.
